mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (employee_id, name, birth, resident_registration_number, phone, email, address, detailed_address, hire_date, termination_date, status, department_id, position_id, remaining_leave, last_modified, modified_by) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{residentRegistrationNumber}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{detailedAddress}, #{hireDate}, #{terminationDate}, #{status}, #{departmentCode}, #{positionCode}, #{remainingLeave}, #{lastModified}, #{modifiedBy})
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET name=#{name}, birth=#{birth}, resident_registration_number=#{residentRegistrationNumber}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, detailed_address=#{detailedAddress}, hire_date=#{hireDate}, termination_date=#{terminationDate}, status=#{status}, department_id=#{departmentCode}, position_id=#{positionCode}, remaining_leave=#{remainingLeave}, last_modified=#{lastModified}, modified_by=#{modifiedBy} WHERE employee_id=#{employeeId}
